writeToUs: Write to us and we will get back to you as soon
subject: Subject
successMessage: Message sent. We will get back to you by email as soon as possible.
yourWelcome: You are always welcome to contact us if you have any questions about the service or want to get in touch with us.
deviating: Deviating opening hours during bank holidays and art exhibitions openings.

unsubscribe.artworkUploadedEmail: Do you want to receive emails when an artist you follow uploads a new artwork?
unsubscribe.artworkLikedEmail: Do you want to receive an email when someone likes one of your artworks?
unsubscribe.startReceivingEmails: Yes, I want to receive emails
unsubscribe.stopReceivingEmails: No, I don't want to receive emails
